remarks: If the scalar field contains ` _i ` , it is completely closed under square roots (i.e. it is quadratically closed).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphsca.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
cphsca.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
cphsqrtcl3 $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ _i e. K /\ A e. K ) -> ( sqrt ` A ) e. K ) $.
